reviewText: This is not a movie! Goosebumps was a television series in the mid 1990s that aired on Fox and was based on the book written by R.L. Stine! The series was filmed in Canada on a low-budget, which explains the bad acting and special effects.There earlier DVD releases, like this one, were horrible as they don't contain menus and the picture quality is slightly below average.Greg and his friends decide to break into the old Coffman house in Say Cheese and Die. Greg finds an over-shaped camera and takes several pictures with it. He later realizes that the camera's pictures can tell the future before it happens.In Say Cheese and Die ... Again, Greg wrote a story for his English class about the evil camera, but his teacher gives him a big "F." Now Greg has to dig up the camera to proof that his story is real.The episodes were filmed a year apart. The actor that played Greg in the first episode plays Greg's older brother in the second, probably because of the actor's sudden growth spurt.These episodes are some of the creepiest out of the Goosebumps series!
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die

reviewText: Scary but on a tame level for pre-teens and up in age.  My grandchildren love all of the Goosebumps movies.
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die

reviewText: I loved goosebumps as a kid, so i started ordering them for my daughter.She loves them.She has watched this one several times.Happy with my purchase!
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die

reviewText: I love reading the goosebumps books with my little boys and this was one of the best. The story is funny and makes you wonder who dunnit and I thought it was appropriate for the intended age group. I liked the main character and the supporting cast (one of them truly reminded me of my oldest son.) I thought the reactions to having the camera pointed at you were fun. I liked this one a lot.
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die

reviewText: My brother says say cheese and die is his favorite Goosebumps ever. When I was younger I liked it too.
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die

reviewText: pretty good, got this for my daughter and it gets 4 out of 5 stars
Title: Goosebumps: Say Cheese and Die
